fields_of_interest: Research and innovation, Public Health, Transport
eu_initiatives: The EAA is mainly concerned by scienfific publishing and organization of scientific conferences
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: EAA is international affiliate of International Commission on Acoustics
goals__remit: The European Acoustics Association (EAA) – Asociación Europea de Acústica, from hereon referred to as the ASSOCIATION, is a non-profit entity established for a period of unlimited duration, with the purpose of promoting the development of the science of acoustics, its technologies and its applications, and including in its membership the associations in European countries interested in the objectives of the ASSOCIATION. https://euracoustics.org/
